WHY CHOOSE US

Customer - first

Our staff will always provide high-quality free consultation

30 days money back

If you have any questions about our product or just didn’t like something — we promise your money back on purchased goods, excluding labour. Of course we will do our best to answer any questions.

Life-time warranty on our jobs

Yes, its correct: we provide Life-time warranty on all our jobs. Once it done — warranty will work until you own the car.

Customer and partner support

We always respond to all questions about our products especially after installation

Quick response

We stock items for all popular makes and models

1 year warranty

Don’t care about any issue that can happen with equipment — we provide full one year warranty for all our products

Keep up with the times

We provide modern solutions backed by our experience in the industry

Free pre-orders

If we don’t have something in stock — no need to leave the deposit. We will order it for you for free

We are ready to come to your location

We provide installation all around the Ireland for extra fee

Experience

Our fully qualified technicians and engineers have 10+ years of experience in the industry
